Brighten up reading time with this fun, interactive tool.

Kids who read 20 minutes a day take in 1.8 million more words each year and perform better academically. The Hourglass motivates your child to read more by making it fun and easy to track. It combines an age-old tool with a modern user experience while minimizing distractions from mobile phones and paper reading logs.

Pairs with Mobile App for Easy Tracking

Using the Hourglass with the Beanstack mobile app can give you more insight into your child’s reading. View detailed stats about reading sessions, including badges earned, books completed, total time spent reading, and more. You can even switch between multiple family members’ accounts with a quick tap.
